secondaryNominees.name: Gatto Ciliegia Contro il Grande Freddo

nominations.notes: A masterful work that gives life to a Kafkaesque reality, rendering us unable to escape our dreams and nightmares. A film full of metaphors and visions that, thanks to its photography, gives strange, but decisive and extreme, emotions.
